title: Tsup Builder
description: Run a build on the project using ESBuild with a patched tsup configuration

entry.description: The path to the entry file, relative to project.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

external.description: Mark one or more module as external. Can use * wildcards, such as *.png.

bundle.description: Whether to bundle the main entry point and additional entry points. Set to false to keep individual output files.

includeSrc.description: Should the source files be added to the distribution folder in an `src` directory.

debug.description: Should output be unminified with source mappings.

banner.description: A short heading added to the top of each typescript file added in the output folder's `src` directory.
banner.default: This code was developed by Storm Software (<https://stormsoftware.org>) and is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.

verbose.description: Should write extra log outputs with details from the executor.

define.description: Define global constants that can be used in the source code. The value will be converted into a stringified JSON.

env.description: Define environment variables that can be used in the source code. The value will be converted into a stringified JSON.

apiReport.description: Should API Extractor generate an API Report file.

docModel.description: Should API Extractor generate an Doc Model markdown file.

tsdocMetadata.description: Should API Extractor generate an TSDoc Metadata file.

options.description: Additional options to pass to tsup. See <https://paka.dev/npm/tsup@7.2.0/api#d35d54aca71eb26e>.

plugins.description: List of ESBuild plugins to use during processing

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply `glob`. Defaults to the project root.

output.description: Relative path within the output folder.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.
